The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 February is 3,546,803 (6,301.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 February, there were 88,647 new confirmed cases (157.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 February, there were 125,659 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 29% (37,012 fewer cases).
